function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity of lockers, toilets, and change booths may increase the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among individuals using the facilities.","Mitigation":"Redesigning the layout to separate high-traffic areas and improve ventilation.","Technologies":"Use of air purification and ventilation systems to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens.","People":"Users and occupants of the locker, toilet, and change booth areas.","Owner":"Facility management and design professionals."},{"Description":"Close proximity of individuals in the swimming pool and Jacuzzi areas may lead to the spread of contagions.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of waterborne or airborne diseases in the pool and Jacuzzi.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular disinfection, and promoting social distancing measures.","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems for water treatment, advanced filtration systems, and air purifiers to reduce airborne pathogens.","People":"Swimmers, individuals using the Jacuzzi, and pool staff.","Owner":"Pool management and health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the indoor running track area may lead to stagnant air and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Risk of airborne disease transmission due to poor air circulation in the enclosed space.","Mitigation":"Installation of proper ventilation systems, periodic air quality monitoring, and promoting good hygiene practices among users.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air exchange units, and air quality sensors for monitoring.","People":"Runners and individuals using the indoor track.","Owner":"Facility management and building maintenance staff."}]}
